page.title: 06EVENTS
page.content: MANY OF THE MAJOR EVENTS WHICH OCCUR IN THE NORTHWICH BLOCK ARE ANNUAL EVENTS.THE REGATTA,WHICH IS ORGANISED BY NORTHWICH ROWING CLUB,IS HELD EVERY MAY BANK HOLIDAY.ROSE QUEENS FROM ALL THE SURROUNDING DISTRICTS ARE PARADED IN A CARNIVAL WHICH TAKES PLACE EVERY JULY.THIS COINCIDES WITH THE ARRIVAL OF THE FAIR IN THE TOWN. THERE HAVE BEEN CERTAIN EVENTS WHICH HAVE HAPPENED IN NORTHWICH IN 1985 WHICH ARE UNLIKELY TO HAPPEN AGAIN IN THE NEAR FUTURE.A ROW OF COTTAGES CALLED "POSTLES PLACE" WAS DEMOLISHED DESPITE THE ATTEMPTS OF SOME COUNCIL OFFICIALS TO SAVE THEM AS LISTED BUILDINGS.WINNINGTON PARK PRIMARY SCHOOL MOVED TO A NEW LOCATION AND IN DOING SO ENDED A NINETY-NINE YEAR ASSOCIATION WITH I.C.I.THE CHEMICAL COMPANY OPENED THE SCHOOL FOR CHILDREN OF ITS WORKERS IN 1886.
